definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: I was terrified out of my mind when I climbed Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 當我爬埃費勒斯峯時，嚇得膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: No one can enjoy freedom without trembling.
sentences.chinese: 人們無不在膽顫心驚中享受着自由。

sentences.english: The U. S. economy is spooking investors.
sentences.chinese: 美國經濟讓投資人膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: The U.S. economy is spooking investors.
sentences.chinese: 美國經濟讓投資人膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: That mad look in his eyes gives me the jitters.
sentences.chinese: 他眼裏惱火的眼神使我膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: He shudders at the sight of a snake.
sentences.chinese: 他一見到蛇就膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: I hide in the dark night, crazy painful and scared to strike terror into the heart of.
sentences.chinese: 我躲在夜的黑裏抓狂痛苦而害怕得膽顫心驚。

sentences.english: It's frightening to be here in her room by herself.
sentences.chinese: 獨自呆在房間裏，她感到膽顫心驚。
